Under most cases 5.2 mmol/l is consider normal. Lab ranges may vary by each lab. But my fasting blood sugar was 8.1 which is quite high. Before this test i used BP tablest for 4 days until the test is done.Later from the next day i was tested for Random blood sugar several times for 2 days always the readings are normal the highest shown is 5.2.
